data.title: Convert Burundian Francs (BIF) and Uganda Shillings (UGX): Currency Exchange Rate Conversion Calculator
data.meta_description: Calculator to convert money in Burundian Franc (BIF) to and from Uganda Shilling (UGX) using up to date exchange rates.
data.text:
This Burundian Franc and Uganda Shilling convertor is up to date with exchange rates from August 18, 2024.

Enter the amount to be converted in the box to the left of Burundian Franc. Use "Swap currencies" to make Uganda Shilling the default currency. Click on Uganda Shillings or Burundian Francs to convert between that currency and all other currencies.

The Burundian Franc is the currency in Burundi (BI, BDI). The Uganda Shilling is the currency in Uganda (UG, UGA). The symbol for BIF can be written FBu. The symbol for UGX can be written USh. The Burundian Franc is divided into 100 centimes. The Uganda Shilling is divided into 100 cents. The exchange rate for the Burundian Franc was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The exchange rate for the Uganda Shilling was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The BIF conversion factor has 5 significant digits. The UGX conversion factor has 4 significant digits.
